name: Autolink Generator
author: Fulfillment Global Corporation

sections.description:
This plugin generates and inserts additional links and AI-Generated content into your WordPress posts, based on configured keywords matched in the content of your WordPress posts.

Usage

Install and activate the plugin.

Configure the plugin’s settings.

To stop the plugin, simply deactivate and/or uninstall the plugin.

Settings

The plugin’s settings can be configured on the Autolink Generate settings page. Settings have sensible defaults and are self-explanatory.

Some noteworthy settings:

Placeholder HTML Class: Defines the HTML class that a HTML element should match, for AI-Generated content to be placed into the matched HTML element, in posts. For example, if this option is set to `ai-content` then `<div class="ai-content" />` or `<div class="ai-content" />` will be replaced to `<div class="ai-content">AI-Generated content</div>`. If this option is blank, the AI-Generated content for the post will simply be appended to the post.

Error Email Address: Specifies the site administrator email address to send an email to, when various errors occur (e.g. when a feed is automatically disabled, or new AI-generated content cannot be requested, etc.), so that the issue can be attended to. The site's default Administration Email Address is used, if this option is blank.<h3>Third party service description</h3>

This plugin relies on he3.co.za as a third party service, in order for the plugin to work.

The reason for using the third party service, is to generate additional AI content for posts, based on the content of existing posts.

No personal data is collected during the process.

As can be seen in the plugin’s source code, this plugin only uses the publicly visible content of a WordPress post, and information about the post, such as its WordPress permalink.

Links to the third party service:

https://he3.co.za

Data received by the plugin via HTTP, is cached in the site’s local WordPress database. The database is not deleted when the plugin is uninstalled, to prevent unintentional data loss.

Third party services’ terms of use and privacy policies:

https://buythis.co.za/terms
https://buythis.co.za/privacy
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free to use?

Yes, this plugin is free to use. The source code is available for you to examine what the plugin does and how it works.
